title: Public Service Innovation Lab: Service Improvement Design Through Collaborative Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding basic public service processes and policy design
context.additional_context: Learners, as administrative/public service officers, analyze public service innovation cases and practice collaborative problem-solving methods. They participate in asynchronous discussions using digital devices and receive continuous feedback through formative assessments.

learning_goals: Collaboratively diagnose public service issues and propose at least three innovative solutions
Ability to establish project plans using a service design framework based on the NPS (New Public Service) model
Ability to operate knowledge exchange processes among stakeholders using online collaboration tools
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
